section.name: Overview
section.p: Beige UML is an UML diagram editor. It has two user interfaces - ordinary desktop SWING and Android.

Features:
Supports UML 2.4.1 compliant class diagram, package diagram, object diagram, sequence diagram and use case diagram.
It generates UML class diagram from Java source.
It's a doclet that generates standard Javadoc with UML class diagram.

This application you can download from Central Maven Repository: search beige-uml. There beige-uml-swing-[VERSION]-jar-with-dependencies.jar is Swing application and beige-uml-android-[VERSION].apk is Android application. Its source code you can download at https://github.com/demidenko05/beige-uml
Source of beige-maven-skin (Maven site skin based on bootstrap) and beige-android-demo (demo of Android tree/file-chooser, list-chooser etc.) you can find at http://sourceforge.net/projects/beigeuml/
